message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $13,000 is a bit steep for me.  I'd be willing to pay $11,000.  Let's see if we can make this work.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I'm willing to negotiate,  $11,000 is still a bit low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $12,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's try to reach an agreement!
Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $12,000.  However, I'm still only able to go up to $11,500.  It's a fair compromise, and I believe it's a good deal for both of us.
